plot: Greg has an over active imagination and hates school. The two collide one day, and Greg takes himself to a post apocalyptic world where his deformed classmates are out for more than just blood.
title: Chewed Up
plot_es: Greg has an over active imagination and hates school. The two collide one day, and Greg takes himself to a post apocalyptic world where his deformed classmates are out for more than just blood.
plot_en: Greg has an over active imagination and hates school. The two collide one day, and Greg takes himself to a post apocalyptic world where his deformed classmates are out for more than just blood.
